short_desc: 211 is the national, toll-free, three-digit phone number to call 24 hours a day for information about local health and human services
description: 2-1-1 Kern County, a program of Community Action Partnership of Kern (the Partnership) will provide comprehensive Information and Referral services that links Kern County residents to community health and human services and support.  The Partnership has been designated by the California Public Utilities Commission as the 2-1-1 provider for Kern County.
